title: Credit Suisse Unveils Sweeping Revamp to Revive Its Fortunes
description: The restructuring includes shrinking its investment bank and raising $4 billion in capital from investors, including a state-owned Saudi bank.
dc:creator: Michael J. de la Merced
media:credit: Lea Meienberg for The New York Times
media:description: Thursday’s restructuring announcement was the latest effort by Credit Suisse — a linchpin of the Swiss banking industry for 166 years — to turn around its fortunes.
